channel.title: Hermetics and the Golden Dawn with David Griffin and Golden Dawn Adepts, host Julia Sherred | Blog Talk Radio Feed
channel.description: Welcome to the Hermetics and the Golden Dawn Series. The Hermetic Order of the Golden Dawn, founded in 1888, is the world's most renowned school of Western spirituality - with a 120 year proven track record - helping individuals manifest their highest potential. Rooted in 2,000 year old Hermetic Science - the Golden Dawn has fostered great writers like W.B. Yeats and Arthur Machen - and renowned magicians like S.L. MacGregor Mathers, Aleister Crowley, Dion Fortune, Paul Foster Case and Gerald B. Gardner - who each went on to found their own spiritual schools. With countless books written about the Golden Dawn - it has profoundly influenced nearly every aspect of modern occultism - including today's popularity of Tarot, Magick, Wicca, and Paganism. During these weekly programs, we will explore everything from the history and practices of the Hermetic, Rosicrucian and Golden Dawn traditions, to Magic, Tarot, Alchemy, Astrology, Qabalah, how the Golden Dawn works in today's world, its grade structure, initiation rituals and so much more. Join your host Julia Sherred as she interviews guests including David Griffin (International Imperator of the Hermetic Order of the Golden Dawn, the outer order of the Rosicrucian Order of Alpha et Omega®; as well as other adpets including Jean-Pascal Ruggiu, Dr. Robert Word, Tomas Stacewicz and many others. Whether you are old or new to the Golden Dawn or would just like to know more, you will find your answers here. We are open to show suggestions, so if there is a topic you would like more information on, please do not hesitate to contact the show and we will do our best to answer those queries. All those who seek Light and Knowledge, regardless of spiritual beliefs and practices are welcome!

item.title: Walking The Halls Of The Golden Dawn - Sep 26,2009
item.description:
Join me as I sit down with V.H. Frater S.I. as we explore what it is to be a member of the Golden Dawn. We will walk through the grades of the Outer Order (0=0 - 4=7) and talk about some of the difficulties an initiate may encounter as well as the highlights. We will also discuss some tips to help the initiate to continue their walk through the difficult moments on this path. Hopefully by the end of this episode, both people seeking initiation and those already initiated will have a good compliment of tools to help them be a successful Golden Dawn magician.

Hermetics | Golden Dawn | Magick | Initiation | Rosicrusian

item.title: The Word: Logos and Mantra. - Sep 21,2009
item.description:
Join me as I sit down with Dr. Robert Word as we have a general discussion of the role played by sacred words of power in the mystery school traditions and the Golden Dawn.

Golden Dawn | Hermetics | Magick | Sacred Words | Qabalah

item.title: Sexuality & The Golden Dawn - Aug 30,2009
item.description:
Sexual Polarity is an essential cornerstone of the Golden Dawn. Golden Dawn international imperator, David Griffin (www.golden-dawn.com) joins host, Julia Sherred, to dispel misconceptions and shed new light on sexuality and love for spiritual development in the Golden Dawn and the Hermetic and Rosicrucian tradition. The Golden Dawn was revolutionary in admitting women and men on an equal basis already in 1888, and has had a profound influence on modern paganism and wicca.

Golden Dawn | Sacred Sexuality | Paganism | Wicca | Tantra

item.title: The History of Qabalah in the Golden Dawn - Jul 16,2009
item.description:
Join our special guest Tomas Stacewicz (V.H. Frater Sincerus Renatus, Imperator over the Scandinavian Jurisdiction of the Hermetic Order of the Golden Dawn/AO and Imperator of the Temple of the Golden Dawn in Sweden, called Alpha et Omega No. 9 )as we learn about the Qabalah and the history of the Qabalah within the Golden Dawn. Some of the topics we will discuss are: What is the Qabalah? What is the historical lineage of the Qabalah and how was it passed down through the Rosicrucian and Hermetic Orders? How is the Qabalah used in the Golden Dawn system today? Your host is Julia Sherred

Qabalah | Rosicrucians | Hermetics | Golden Dawn | Ceremonial Magic

item.title: Ceremonial Magic and the Golden Dawn Part 2 with Special Guest Tomas Stacewicz - Jul 02,2009
item.description:
Join our special guest Tomas Stacewicz (V.H. Frater Sincerus Renatus, Imperator over the Scandinavian Jurisdiction of the Hermetic Order of the Golden Dawn/AO and Imperator of the Temple of the Golden Dawn in Sweden, called Alpha et Omega No. 9 ) as we continue our discussion on Ceremonial Magic and the Golden Dawn. Today we will explore how Ceremonial Magic is used to gain knowledge of and converse with our Holy Guardian Angel, the relationship between the Emerald Tablet and magic, further explore ritual props and aids, astrological timing, the Hierarchies (the 5 Elements, 7 Planets & 12 Signs of Zodiac), the differences between invocation and evocation, the consecration of physical objects (talismans and implements), Energetic manipulation of the aura, Skrying and traveling in the Spirit Vision (astral projection). Your host is Julia Sherred. You can read Tomas' blog at: http://gyllenegryningen.blogspot.com

Emerald Tablet | Golden Dawn | Hermetics | Ceremonial Magic | Holy Guardian Angel

item.title: Ceremonial Magic and the Golden Dawn with Special Guest Tomas Stacewicz - Jun 25,2009
item.description:
Join special guest Tomas Stacewicz (V.H. Frater Sincerus Renatus, Imperator over the Scandinavian Jurisdiction of the Hermetic Order of the Golden Dawn/AO and Imperator of the Temple of the Golden Dawn in Sweden, called Alpha et Omega No. 9 ) as we discuss Ceremonial Magic and the Golden Dawn. We will discuss how ceremonial magic is different than other forms of magic, how ceremonial magic fits into the Golden Dawn system, the differences between high and low magic, left hand and right hand, as well as talk about the tools of the trade for the ceremonial magician within the Golden Dawn system. Hopefully after today's podcast, listeners will have a better understanding of the ceremonial magician within the constructs of the Golden Dawn. Your host is Julia Sherred. You can read Tomas' blog at: http://gyllenegryningen.blogspot.com

Golden Dawn | Hermetics | Ceremonial Magic | Magic | Occult

item.title: Truth About Alchemy and the Golden Dawn with special guest David Griffin - May 21,2009
item.description:
Join special guest, Golden Dawn International Imperator, G.H. Frater L.E.S., David Griffin as we start our series on Hermetic Alchemy. Tonight we begin with an analysis of common misconceptions about Alchemy and contrast these with an understanding of Alchemy from an initiatic perspective. We will focus tonight on the question: "Is Alchemy a psychological process, a metaphysical speculation, or an age-old spiritual practice?" Hopefully after tonight's podcast, listeners will have a better understanding of the actual role of Alchemy in the Golden Dawn and the Hermetic tradition. Your host is Julia Sherred.

Alchemy | David Griffin | Golden Dawn | Hermetic | Magick

item.title: A Brief Introduction to Hermetics and the Golden Dawn - May 14,2009
item.description:
Regardless of what branch or school of magic one is interested in, researching or pursuing, there is so much information out there, it is hard to wade through it all without a guide. In today’s world, in part thanks to the Internet, it can be quite daunting to try and make sense of all the material and opinions out there regarding any branch or school of magic. Hopefully after today’s podcast, listeners will have a clear picture of who and what exactly the Hermetic Order of the Golden Dawn is. Today's Special Guest is David Griffin (G.H. Frater L.E.S.) Your host is Julia Sherred.

Hermetics | Alchemy | Rosicrusians | Golden Dawn | David Griffin
